TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . He is the owner of a flat in GPE , which he had let to GPE
CARDINAL . In a registered letter of CARDINAL DATE , the applicant informed the tenant that he intended to terminate the lease on expiry of the term on DATE and asked him to vacate the LOC by DATE .
CARDINAL . In a writ served on the tenant on DATE , the applicant reiterated his intention to terminate the lease and summoned the tenant to appear before ORG .
CARDINAL . By a decision of CARDINAL DATE , which was made enforceable on DATE , ORG upheld the validity of the notice to quit and ordered that the premises be vacated by DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant served notice on the tenant requiring him to vacate the premises .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant made a statutory declaration that he urgently required the premises as accommodation for himself .
CARDINAL . On DATE , he informed the tenant that the order for possession would be enforced by a bailiff on DATE .

CARDINAL . DATE and DATE , the bailiff made CARDINAL attempts to recover possession . Each attempt proved unsuccessful , as the applicant was never granted the assistance of the police in enforcing the order for possession .
CARDINAL . In the meanwhile , pursuant to LAW . CARDINAL of DATE , on DATE , the tenant asked ORG to postpone the enforcement proceedings . On DATE , ORG set a fresh date for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the tenant asked ORG to postpone the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG decided to provisionally suspend the enforcement and adjourned the hearing until DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the hearing was reported to DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG ordered that the premises be vacated as soon as possible .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant recovered possession of the flat .

CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice is described in the ORG ’s judgments in the cases of ORG , ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , CARDINAL ) and PERSON v. GPE , ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , CARDINAL ) .
